content.text: Ord Mirit was originally one of the Republic's Ordnance/Regional Depots. After the Battle of Endor, the planet's Imperial garrison relocated to Corellia. During the Yuuzhan Vong War, the planet was a strategic world of the New Republic.

elements.text: The New Jedi Order: Agents of Chaos II: Jedi Eclipse
"Rogues Gallery: Clearance for Immediate Launch"—Star Wars Insider 146
